overview:
I handle operations for SV Mobile Teleshoppe (Teleshoppe.com) - a mobile internet solutions company involved in hosting and aggregation of operator & enterprise content. Its SMS solutions are deployed across 30 mn mobile phones on GSM and CDMA platforms in India. Enterprises using our platform include DHL, Telebrands, Xerox, Ricoh, Baksons, AHA, Career Launcher, PT Education, Hero Mindmine and others

Previously set up Phoolwala.com - a modest venture in the flower delivery business in India. It delivers fresh flowers to 120 cities across India everyday and recently crossed 1 lakh orders

Specialties: Mobile phone software, SMS server architecture and management, cellular operator SMSC access and content, e-commerce applications
